name: epel

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cep, cv(s0)), wcel(c0, cv(s0)))
-| wcel(cv(s0), universe)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cep, cv(s0)), wcel(c0, cv(s0)))
-| wcel(cv(s0), universe)

comment: The membership relation and the membership predicate agree when the "containing" class is a setvar. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-1995.) Replace the first setvar variable with a class variable. (Revised by BJ, 13-Sep-2022.)
